title: Bound (NSFW)
content:
Hi,

I'm working on type face Bound, It could seam extreme  
It is based on BDSM and is work in progress, I have created latin letters and considering cyrillic.  
It's a display type face, I'm looking for someone who would be interested in purchasing my work and making it in to font.  
I could submit tif illustrations or make vector files and fill options for production.

please let me know if it interests ore you have any feedback ore suggestions

see the work at this link  
 [http://rawtype.net/17061/205133/design/bound-type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160851/http:/rawtype.net/17061/205133/design/bound-type)

Thank you

ps: the sample is actual inked illustrations of letters P and S

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160851im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ps_5406.jpg)
author: RAWTYPE

comments.content: Weird! Reminds me of Luc de Groot's [MoveMe MM](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160851/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/porno/).

Wow!

Maybe try contacting relevant publications directly?

Amazing work there, very creative.

...................  
 [Get My Fonts Under Freebies](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160851/http:/lucascobb.com/)
